abstract: Making the simplest fennel salad imaginable, dressed with olive oil and lemon.
snippet: Making the simplest fennel salad imaginable, dressed with olive oil and lemon.
lead_paragraph: I always want salad, maybe even more so this time of year. But the season is changing, and so are the ingredients in my salad bowl. Right now, there is fragrant, crisp fennel bulb available, so in this week's City Kitchen, we're making the simplest fennel salad imaginable, dressed with olive oil and lemon.
